author: schor
msg: [UIMA-1928] Add the bit of xml to run the Jira report, if using the apache-release profile.

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-1928] remove the build plugin to run the jira report from the parent pom - it gets run by all the child poms.  Instead, put into just those child poms that want to run the jira-report, the bit of xml to cause it to run.  Note that this can't be done for the parent-pom itself, so for this one, we have to run the report by hand.

author: joes
